short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select a random episode of a TV show on Netflix

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To use, simply navigate to any TV show on Netflix and select the dice icon (next to the play button).

A random episode will then be selected from the show and played automatically!


Disclaimer:
